p: This Policy explains what information we collect and how we use it. We aim to collect the minimum necessary to operate the Service.
Public wallet data: addresses, balances, transactions on public blockchains.
Technical logs: basic diagnostics (e.g., request time, errors) to keep the Service reliable.
Support messages: if you contact us, we process what you provide to respond.
We do not collect private keys or seed phrases. Never share them with anyone.
We may use minimal cookies or privacy-respecting analytics to understand usage. You can block cookies in your browser.
Comply with legal obligations where applicable.
We do not sell your personal data. We may share limited data with infrastructure providers solely to operate the Service, under appropriate safeguards.
Data may be processed in jurisdictions different from yours. We take reasonable measures to protect data during transfer.
We use reasonable technical and organizational measures. No online service can guarantee absolute security.
Subject to law, you may request access, correction, or deletion of your support data. Blockchain data is public and immutable.
We may update this Policy. Continued use indicates acceptance.
